thought: I need to craft an ender_chest. First, I need to craft an ender_eye. An ender_eye requires an ender_pearl and blaze_powder placed side by side in the crafting grid. I have 1 ender_pearl in slot 24 and 1 blaze_powder in slot 22. I will move the blaze_powder to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: ender_chest

Ok

thought: To craft an ender_chest, I need to place 8 obsidian blocks in a chest shape, with an ender_eye in the middle. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the obsidian blocks from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
